original_title: The Kathy & Mo Show: Parallel Lives
overview: Kathy Najimy and Mo Gaffney bring their award-winning Off-Broadway show to the screen, an evening of boundless humor that reexamines the ongoing quest to find parity and love in a contest handicapped by capricious godsâ€”or in this case, goddesses.
title: The Kathy & Mo Show: Parallel Lives
